kit.leader_skill: "Battle of Wits" or "Gifted Warriors" Category Ki +2 and HP, ATK & DEF +100%

super_attack.name: Special Beam Cannon
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: A Plan to Accumulate Ki
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) DEF 150% up; (Forever) Medium chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) Damage reduction rate 50% up; When attacking: ATK 300% up; For every attack received: (Forever) Damage reduction rate 10% down (no more than -50%); (Forever) ATK 50% down (no more than -300%); For every attack evaded: (Forever) DEF 30% up (up to 150%); For 4 turns from the character's entry turn: Character's Super Attack will be sealed; Starting from the 5th turn from the character's entry turn: Ki +2 and ATK 150% up

lines.text: Medium chance of evading enemy's attack
Damage reduction rate 10% down (no more than -50%)
Character's Super Attack will be sealed
lines.context: For 4 turns from the character's entry turn
Starting from the 5th turn from the character's entry turn
